channel.description: What FIle Woudl I Increase Npc Hits And Their Agression

item.title: Quiiicckkk
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

If you are using 317, this is done in NPCHandler.java

To make an NPC agressive search forpublic boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) and you should see several cases below. Just add this code case 1: but change the 1 to your the ID of your NPC.

To change the damage of an NPC search for // println("rand_npc=" + rand_npc + ", rand=" + rand); below this add this peice of code if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1) { // Change the 1 to your NPC ID hitDiff = 18 + misc.random(30); // change hitDiff to the minimum damage and misc.random(30) to how much higher then his minimum he can hit. In this case his damage could range from 18-48 }

If you aren’t using 317, then Im sorry for wasting your time with this post. You should really declare which one you’re using in the future…

@offtopic: I’d be very happy if someone would look at/bump my thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,446432.0.html

Read full topic
